name: Ralts

passive.name: Teleport
passive.effect: You may search your deck for a Basic Pokemon. If you find a Basic Pokemon, shuffle this Pokemon and all attached cards into your deck, and that becomes your new Active Pokemon.

attacks.name: Psywave
attacks.effect: Deal 10 damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

flavor: Ralts seem incredibly timid, but against powerful Pokemon they can surprisingly hold their own.
